title: 10  René Clair, Entr’acte, 1924
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">10  
René Clair (French, 1898–1981)  
Entr’acte  
1924  
35mm black-and-white film, silent, transferred to digital video; 17 min. loop  
Courtesy MoMA, Circulating Film and Video Library, New York, the Festival Agency, Paris, and the Clair estate  

See the film on YouTube.

</section><section id="figures">René Clair, still from Entr’acte, 1924.
